translated: Jacques Lafitte was a French banker and significant influence in Bayonne born October 24th, 1767 and died in Paris May 26, 1844 who participated in the outcome of the French Revolution in 1830.
original: Jacques Lafitte est un banquier français et notable influent né à Bayonne le 24 octobre 1767 et mort à Paris le 26 mai 1844 ayant participé au dénouement de la révolution française de 1830.
